notes.text: Got to legend 2 with heroes  with about 18ish wins, finished it off with about 11 wins with this, only lost 2 games, 1 to bricking vs heroes and the other was to getting outdrawn in the mirror. Was originally playing 2 lash 2 tiger, swapped 1 of each to another paladin and econ. Lash was neat for playing more aggressively with t1 princess going 2nd. Theoretically opens up some neat swords woman plays though that didn't come up much.
